def solve(n, m, s, t, years):
    year_list = list()
    for year in years:
        year_list.append(s[(year - 1) % n] + t[(year - 1) % m])
    return '\n'.join(year_list)

(n, m) = list(map(int, input().split()))
l1 = input().split()
l2 = input().split()
ans = []

def get_year(year, l1, l2, n, m):
    year -= 1
    return l1[year % n] + l2[year % m]
x = int(input())
for i in range(x):
    ans.append(get_year(int(input()), l1, l2, n, m))
print('\n'.join(ans))

t = input().split(' ')
rng = int(input())
names = []
for i in range(rng):
    str = ''
    year = int(input())
    if year <= n:
        str += s[year - 1]
    else:
        str += s[(year - 1) % n]
    if year <= m:
        str += t[year - 1]
    else:
        str += t[(year - 1) % m]
    names.append(str)
print(*names, sep='\n')

(n, m) = input('').split()
(n, m) = (int(n), int(m))
words_n = input('').split()
words_m = input('').split()
queries = int(input(''))
names = []
for query in range(0, queries):
    year = int(input())
    index_n = year % n - 1
    index_m = year % m - 1
    name = words_n[index_n] + words_m[index_m]
    names.append(name)

import sys
(n, m) = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split())
n_strings = sys.stdin.readline().rstrip().split()
m_strings = sys.stdin.readline().rstrip().split()
q = int(sys.stdin.readline())
for year in map(int, sys.stdin):
    year -= 1
    n_index = year % n
    m_index = year % m
    name = n_strings[n_index] + m_strings[m_index]
    print(name)

z = list(map(int, input().split()))
a = list(map(str, input().split()))
b = list(map(str, input().split()))
n = int(input())
test = []
for i in range(n):
    j = int(input())
    test.append(j)
for i in range(n):
    first = second = 0
    if z[0] % test[i] == 0:
        first = test[i] - 1
    if z[1] % test[i] == 0:
        second = test[i] - 1
    if z[0] % test[i] != 0 or z[1] % test[i] != 0:
        first = test[i] % z[0] - 1
        second = test[i] % z[1] - 1
    print(a[first] + b[second])

(n, m) = map(int, input().split())
s = input()
t = input()
s1 = [s]
t1 = [t]

def convert(lst):
    return lst[0].split()
l1 = convert(s1)
l2 = convert(t1)
len1 = len(l1)
len2 = len(l2)
(l3, l4) = ([], [])
q = int(input())
while q:
    q1 = int(input())
    x = q1 // len1
    index1 = q1 - x * len1
    y = q1 // len2
    index2 = q1 - y * len2
    l3.append(l1[index1 - 1] + l2[index2 - 1])
    q = q - 1
for i in l3:
    print(i)

numberl = []

l = list(map(int, input().split()))
s1 = list(map(str, input().split()))
s2 = list(map(str, input().split()))
q = int(input())
n = l[0]
m = l[1]
a = n * m
while q:
    yr = int(input())
    if yr > a:
        yr = yr % a
    y1 = yr % n
    y2 = yr % m
    if y1 == 0:
        y1 = n
    if y2 == 0:
        y2 = m
    ans = s1[y1 - 1] + s2[y2 - 1]
    print(ans)
    q -= 1

def solve(n, m, arr_s, arr_t, years):
    str_years = list()
    for year in years:
        str_years.append(arr_s[(year - 1) % n] + arr_t[(year - 1) % m])
    return '\n'.join(str_years)
(n, m) = map(int, input().split(' '))
arr_s = input().split(' ')
arr_t = input().split(' ')
q = int(input())
years = list()
for _ in range(0, q):
    year = int(input())
    years.append(year)
print(solve(n, m, arr_s, arr_t, years))
